page.title: 05Government
page.content: Gloucestershire County Council is responsible for roads, schools,Police and the other major needs of the area.The local council is the { {Cotswold District Council }which provides dustmen snow clearing,road sweeping etc.We also have the {Temple {Guiting and Cutsdean Parish Councils} who look after local needs and advise the District Council on Planning Applications. We do not have street lights or sewage pipes as everyone has cesspits. We also do not have any piped gas supply. Our local Member of Parliament is Nicholas Ridley, who is the Conservative Transport Minister. Mr. Williams is the District Councillor.
